title: A proclamation Forasmuch as the lords of the Committy of our privy Council met in the west ... requiring and commanding all and sundry the heretors ... within the shyre of Air ... to appear personally before the said Lords ...
author: Scotland. Committee of the West.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Robert Saunders, Printer to the City and University, by warrant of the Privy Council,
